name: Stowaway (Reupload)
description:
The pre-alpha build of the once in development styled horror game Stowaway

 Stowaway was (to my knowledge) one of the first indie-games to be developed on Unreal Engine 4 that launched an (albeit failed) kickstarter.

The demo is finished but has very little content, and will take little over 15 minutes to complete.

Please keep in mind: this is only a re-upload to preserve the game for historic reasons. If I am contacted by the original developer or told to take this down, the page will be taken down permanently.
